pkgmetadata.longdescription: biliup-rs is a command-line submission tool for bili. It supports multi-p submission, upload line selection, and concurrent number setting to ensure that the upload speed of foreign servers can run full of bandwidth. Support SMS login, account password login, scan code login, browser login, and save the cookie and token returned after login in cookie.json, which can be used in other projects.
biliup-rs 是一个B站命令行投稿工具，支持多p投稿，支持上传线路选择， 并发数设置，保证国外服务器上传速度可跑满带宽。 支持 短信登录，账号密码登录，扫码登录，浏览器登录 ，并将登录后返回的 cookie 和 token 保存在 cookie.json 中， 可用于其他项目。
